title: "Bandwidth Accelerates Enterprise Cloud Adoption and Product Innovation with AWS"
excerpt: "Bandwidth Inc. (NASDAQ: BAND), a leading global enterprise cloud communications company, today announced it is again expanding its long relationship with Amazon Web Services (AWS) to use the Amazon Chime Software Development Kit (SDK)--increasing the pace of innovation and extending the ecosystem for the Bandwidth Communications Cloud."
